tasks.prompt: Create hello_probe.py with greet(name: str) -> str returning "Hello, <name>!" and a one-line docstring.
Create math_probe.py with clamp(x: int, low: int, high: int) -> int. Return low/high bounds when x is outside range.
Create key_probe.py with sorted_keys(payload: dict) -> list[str] that returns sorted string keys from payload.
